content: "The families of some victims have accused the royal family of financially backing terrorist groups that carried out the 2001 attacks." I know they did! They should be allowed to sue the Saudi Royals. "http://hosted.ap.org/dynamic/stories/U/US_SEPT_11_LAWSUIT?SITE=FLTAM&SECTION=US"
reply: "The families of some victims have accused the royal family of financially backing terrorist groups that carried out the 2001 attacks." I know they did! They should be allowed to sue the Saudi Royals. "http://hosted.ap.org/dynamic/stories/U/US_SEPT_11_LAWSUIT?SITE=FLTAM&SECTION=US"
title: 9/11 families angered by US support for Saudis
